paper_abstract: In this paper, the notions of alpha-migrative uninorms over semi t-operators and alpha-migrative semi t-operators over uninorms are introduced and investigated. All solutions of the migrativity equations for all possible combinations of semi t-operators and uninorms are characterized. (C) 2015 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Migrativity property for uninorms and semi t-operators
